mapper.select: SELECT tmp.netSum AS netSum, tmp.netConnectSum AS netConnectSum, tmp.netDisconnectSum AS netDisconnectSum, tmp.netUnsentSum AS netUnsentSum, IFNULL(round(tmp.netConnectSum * 100 / tmp.netSum, 2), '100.00') AS netConnectRate FROM ( SELECT COUNT(ID) AS netSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.STATUS = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS netConnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.STATUS = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS netDisconnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.STATUS is null OR mar.STATUS = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS netUnsentSum FROM MONITOR_NET mar) tmp
